pullRequest.title: Migration and validation APIs for version upgrade (#454)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Cherry-pick commit 3aef3a3
Description of changes:
Migration and validation API for upgrading Elasticsearch from 6.8 to 7.4 with security plugin install.
Testing:
[AAA@ip-xx-yyy-zz-xxx logs]$ curl -k
--cacert ./ca.pem --key ./admin-key.pem --cert ./admin.pem https://localhost/_opendistro/_security/api/validate?pretty
{
"status" : "OK",
"message" : "OK."
}
[AAA@ip-xx-yyy-zz-xxx  logs]$ curl -k -XPOST
--cacert ./ca.pem --key ./admin-key.pem --cert ./admin.pem https://localhost/_opendistro/_security/api/migrate?pretty
{
"status" : "OK",
"message" : "Migration completed."
}
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message:
Migration and validation APIs for version upgrade (#454)

* Migration and valdiation APIs for version upgrade for advance module cherry pick of 8cf60f21e650aa16a77c39339a2455e7603c130b

* Version upgrade fix cherry pick of 0286850f413016b1586a13189a9bb9d9b05a9bd3

* version upgrade fix cherry pick of 472d652261c3a19affecfa594b93f7052dc20a68

* Fixing version upgrade test

(cherry picked from commit 2259e6b743f4539e1798ef625d93d2972152a4fa)

* refectoring

* Registering GET handler for Validate API

* NodesDN changes

Co-authored-by: Allen Yin <48698112+allenyin96@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Allen Yin <allenyin@amazon.com>
Co-authored-by: Debjani Banerjee <bdebjani@amazon.com>

nodes.bodyText: Could NodesDn also be added to validation API ?
